descriptionHtml:
Adds The Dark Brotherhood themed crossbow to the game! For now, the only way to get this is via the console (code is at the bottom). You can do anything with this. Retex it or whatever. But if you\\\'re going to use this on your mod. Give me a quick pm and i\\\'ll answer as soon as i can.This my very first mod so enjoy and happy killing! -This was originally supposed to be Daedric themed but i remembered my favorite armor (Deacon\\\\\\\'s Dark brotherhood armor) You can search it here in the Nexus or at the Steam Workshop. Just report any bugs or crash or whatever in the comment.

P.S. Please check the name of the item. It\\\'s supposed to be Listener\\\'s Crossbow not Daedric Crossbow I think i made a mistake on something in CK 

This is in honor of Deacon\\\\\\\'s Very AWESOME DB weapons and Armors! You have to check them out!

Console item Code:
player.additem 26011d3d 1
Player.additem 2601940e ??  (How many bolts you like)
author: TheAkantor
